data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Moravički, Serbia.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Moravički, Serbia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Moravički, Serbia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Moravički, Serbia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Moravički with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bosniak people might believe through him.
There are 154,600 people living in the state of Moravički. Only about 1,110 might be believers.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Moravički, Serbia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,110 believers in Moravički to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 153,490 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Moravički
location.cities_list: Čačak, Gornji Milanovac, Prislonica, Brezovica, Donja Gorevnica
location.cities_list_w_pop: Čačak (117,072), Gornji Milanovac (23,982), Prislonica (1,735), Brezovica (1,000), Donja Gorevnica (981)
